sqlGroup.name: carGps
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT mci.*, mcg.* FROM mo_car_gps mcg INNER JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.device_id = mcg.device_id WHERE mcg.device_id IS NOT NULL AND mci.car_no = ? AND mcg.baidu_latitude >= 1 AND mcg.baidu_longitude >= 1 ORDER BY mcg.create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT mcg.id, mcg.baidu_longitude, mcg.baidu_latitude, mcg.create_time, mcg.timestamp FROM mo_car_gps mcg WHERE mcg.device_id = ? AND mcg.baidu_latitude >= 1 AND mcg.baidu_longitude >= 1 ORDER BY mcg.timestamp DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT mci.car_no, mcg.baidu_longitude, mcg.baidu_latitude, mci.car_flag FROM mo_car_gps mcg INNER JOIN mo_car_info mci ON mci.device_id = mcg.device_id WHERE mcg.device_id IS NOT NULL AND baidu_latitude BETWEEN ? AND ? AND baidu_longitude BETWEEN ? AND ? AND mcg.baidu_latitude >= 1 AND mcg.baidu_longitude >= 1 GROUP BY mci.device_id ORDER BY mcg.create_time DESC

SELECT round(baidu_longitude, 5) lng, round(baidu_latitude, 5) lat, count(*) + 100 count FROM mo_car_gps WHERE baidu_latitude BETWEEN ? AND ? AND baidu_longitude BETWEEN ? AND ? AND baidu_latitude >= 1 AND baidu_longitude >= 1 GROUP BY round(baidu_longitude, 5), round(baidu_latitude, 5)
SELECT baidu_longitude lng, baidu_latitude lat FROM mo_car_gps_time WHERE device_id = ? AND create_time BETWEEN ? AND ? AND baidu_latitude >= 1 AND baidu_longitude >= 1 ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT * -- @where FROM (SELECT mci.car_no, mci.car_no_color, mci.car_flag, mci.car_model, mci.car_framework_no, count(mcg.id) count, mcg.create_date, mci.engine_discharge_value, mci.engine_power, mci.engine_model, mci.engine_gass_type, mci.device_id FROM mo_car_info mci LEFT JOIN mo_car_gps mcg ON mcg.device_id = mci.device_id WHERE baidu_latitude >= 1 AND baidu_longitude >= 1 GROUP BY mcg.device_id) tt -- @condition WHERE tt.count > 0
